summary: This document discusses potential assets for operations in Italy targeting PERUNEN, focusing on AMHIP 1 and other candidates like CHAS FOA and IDEN C. It addresses their suitability, access, and potential risks, including contamination of reputations and the need for cover stories.
title: Potential Assets for Operations in Italy Targeting PERUNEN
